doc:
Robert Hardy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Hardy 0 Timothy Sydney Robert Hardy (29 October 1925 – 3 August 2017) was an English actor who had a long career in the theatre, film and television. He began his career as a classical actor and later earned widespread recognition for roles such as Siegfried Farnon in the BBC television series All Creatures Great and Small, Cornelius Fudge in the Harry Potter film series and Winston Churchill in several productions, beginning with the Southern Television series Winston Churchill: The Wilderness Years. He was nominated for the BAFTA for Best Actor for All Creatures Great and Small in 1980 and Winston Churchill: The Wilderness Years in 1982. Aside from acting, Hardy was an acknowledged expert on the medieval English longbow and wrote two books on the subject. Timothy_Sydney_Robert_Hardy ( 29_October_1925 – 3_August_2017 ) was an_English_actor who had a_long_career in the_theatre_,_film_and_television . He began his_career as a_classical_actor and later_earned widespread_recognition for roles such_as Siegfried_Farnon in the_BBC_television_series All_Creatures_Great_and_Small , Cornelius_Fudge in the_Harry_Potter_film_series and Winston_Churchill in several_productions , beginning with the_Southern_Television_series_Winston_Churchill : The_Wilderness_Years . He was_nominated for the_BAFTA_for_Best_Actor for All_Creatures Great and Small in 1980 and Winston_Churchill : The_Wilderness_Years in 1982 . Aside from acting , Hardy was an_acknowledged_expert on the_medieval_English_longbow and wrote two_books on the_subject .
